column4: Ok...Here is a bit detailed explanation. I have 3 hd( hard disks). I used to install xp on one hd and keep data on ther remaining hds. Right now I installed ubuntu 10.10 on hd1 and I have a lot of data on hd2 and 3.  after installing ubuntu i directly connected hd2 and 3 but didn't know how to access the data in them. pls help me.
you might need to use ntfs-3g to mount
